description:
We got to see some gameplay from the Tokyo Game Show demo during the Metal Gear Hotline stage show at TGS 2024. We get a look at the visuals, the ability to pause during a cutscene, various options, and much more. Check out the roughly 8 minute gameplay showcase.

#metalgearsolid #tgs2024 #gaming
title: Metal Gear Solid Delta Snake Eater Live Gameplay Showcase TGS 2024 (Japanese Audio)

description:
The Replacer is back so that you can play Call of Duty: Black Ops 6! Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 comes out October 25th!

#cod #blackops6 #gaming
title: Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 The Replacer Live Action Official Trailer

description:
During the Death Stranding 2 Special Stage show at TGS 2024 we got a bunch of reveals and looks at some of the characters in the game including: Tarman (George Miller),  Fragile (Lea Seydoux), Dollman (Fatih Akin), Rainy (Shioli Kutsuna), Tomorrow (Elle Fanning), and Heartman (Nicolas Winding Refn). Additionally we got a fun look at the photo mode as well. Check timestamps below!

0:00 Intro
0:51 Tarman
1:28 Fragile
2:09 Dollman
3:05 Rainy
3:12 Tomorrow
5:27 Heartman
6:23 Photo Mode

#tgs2024 #deathstranding2 #gaming
title: Death Stranding 2 On The Beach Reveals From TGS 2024 (Japanese Audio)
